maqras.text: 90|1|Ware wa kono machi ni oite chikau.
90|2|Anata wa kono machi no (ijūken o motsu) jūmindearu.
90|3|Umu mono to umareru mono ni kakete (chikau).
90|4|Hontōni ware wa, ningen o rōku suru yō ni tsukutta.
90|5|Kare (ningen) wa, nanimono mo, jibun o sayū suru mono wa nai to kangaeru no ka.
90|6|Kare wa,`watashi wa taihen'na zaisan o tsuiyashita.' To iu.
90|7|Kare wa, dare mo kare o miteinai to kangaeru no ka.
90|8|Ware wa, kare no tame ni ryōme o tsukuttade wanai ka,
90|9|matahitotsu no shita to futatsu no kuchibiru o.
90|10|Sarani futatsunomichi o kare ni shimeshita (de wanai ka).
90|11|Daga kare wa, kewashī michi o torou to wa shinai.
90|12|Kewashī michi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
90|13|(Soreha) dorei o kaihō shi,
90|14|matawa kiga no hi ni wa shokumotsu o dashite,
90|15|chikai enja no minashigo o,
90|16|matawa hidoku awarena hinja o (yashinau koto).
90|17|Sore kara shinkō suru mono ni natte nintai no tame ni hagemashi ai, tagaini shinsetsu, onjō o tsukushi au (kotodearu).
90|18|Korera wa migite no nakamadearu.
90|19|Daga waga shirushi o kyohi suru mono, kare-ra wa hidarite no nakamadearu.
90|20|Kare-ra no ue ni wa, gōka ga ōikabusarudearou.
91|1|Taiyō to sono kagayaki ni oite,
91|2|sore ni shitagau tsuki ni oite,
91|3|(taiyō o) kagayaki gen wasu hiru ni oite,
91|4|sore o ōu yoru ni oite,
91|5|ten to, sore o uchi tateta okata ni oite,
91|6|daichi to, sore o hirogeta okata ni oite,
91|7|tamashī to, sore o tsuriai chitsujo tsuketa okata ni oite,
91|8|jaaku to shinjin ni tsuite, sore (tamashī) ni shisa shita okata ni oite (chikau).
91|9|Hontōni sore (tamashī) o kiyomeru mono wa seikō shi,
91|10|sore o yogosu mono wa horobiru.
91|11|Samūdo (no min) wa, sono hōgaina okonai ni yotte (yogen-sha o) uso-tsuki yobawari shita.
91|12|Kare-ra no naka no mottomo jaaku no mono ga (fushinjin no tame) tachiagatta toki,
91|13|arrā no shito (sārifu) wa kare-ra ni,`arrā no mesu 骼駝Dearu. Soreni mizu o noma se nasai.' To itta.
91|14|Daga kare-ra wa, kare o uso-tsuki-sha to yobi, sono hiza no ken o ki~tsu(te fugu ni shi)ta. Sorede omo wa, sono tsumi no tame ni kare-ra o horoboshi, tairage rareta.
91|15|Kare wa, sono kekka o koryo sa renai.
92|1|Ōwa reru yoru ni oite,
92|2|kagayaku hiru ni oite,
92|3|danjo o sōzō sa reta okata ni oite (chikau).
92|4|Anata gata no doryoku wa, hontōni tayō (na ketsumatsu)dearu.
92|5|Sore de hodokoshi o nashi,-nushi o osoreru mono,
92|6|mata shizen o jisshō suru mono ni wa,
92|7|ware wa (shifuku e no michi o) yōi ni shiyou.
92|8|Daga gōyokude, unuborete iru mono,
92|9|shizen o kyohi suru mono ni wa,
92|10|ware wa (kunan e no michi o) yōi ni surudearou.
92|11|Kare ga horobi sarou to suru toki, sono tomi wa kare ni yakudatanaidearou.
92|12|Hontōni michibiki wa ware ni ari,
92|13|raise mo gense mo ware ni zokusuru.
92|14|Sorede ware wa moesakaru gōka ni tsuite anata gata ni keikoku shita.
92|15|Mottomo fukōna monodenai kagiri, dare mo sore de yaka renai.
92|16|Soreha (shinri o) usodearu to ii somuki satta-sha.
92|17|Daga (omo no tame ni) chūsei no kagiri o tsukushita mono wa, sorekara sukuwa re,
92|18|sono tomi o hodokoshi, jibun o kiyomeru.
92|19|Mata dareka-ra mo, jihi no hōshū o motomenai.
92|20|Isshōkenmei ni shikōsha,-nushi no mikao o kou dakedearu.
92|21|Yagate, kare wa (jūbun ni) manzoku dekirudearou.
93|1|Asa (no kagayaki) ni oite,
93|2|seijakuna yoru ni oite (chikau).
93|3|Omo wa, anata o misute rarezu, nikuma reta wakede mo nai.
93|4|Hontōni raise (shōrai) wa, anata ni totte utsushiyo (genzai) yori, motto yoi nodearu.
93|5|Yagate omo wa anata no manzoku suru mono o o sazuke ni naru.
93|6|Kare wa minashigo no anata o mitsuke rare, higo nasa retade wanai ka.
93|7|Kare wa samayotte ita anata o mitsukete, michibiki o atae.
93|8|Mata mazushī anata o mitsukete, yūfuku ni nasa retade wanai ka.
93|9|Dakara minashigo o shītagete wa naranai.
93|10|Kou mono o 揆 Ne tsukete wa naranai.
93|11|Anata no omo no onkei o nobetsutaeru ga ī.
